title: Spiritual | Chiropractor in Freeport, FL | Freeport Family Chiropractic Clinic
description: Spiritual in Freeport, FL. Freeport Family Chiropractic Clinic is your local Chiropractor in Freeport serving all of your needs. Call us today at (850) 835-9867 for an appointment.
cleaned_text: - [Prosperity Consciousness](https://freeportfamilychiropractic.com/articles/general/415878-prosperity-consciousness) Einstein reputedly divided people in two groups, those who believe we live in a friendly universe, and those who don't. Brilliant in its simplicity, it points out the fundamental basis of wellness psychology - that a well mind knows that we live in a friendly universe, brimming with opportunity and potential, [Read more](https://freeportfamilychiropractic.com/articles/general/415878-prosperity-consciousness) - [Identity](https://freeportfamilychiropractic.com/articles/general/415740-identity) The big distinction about wellness psychology is that it is largely a manifestation of your identity, who you believe yourself to be. If you consider yourself a well person, it goes a long way toward producing well habits and a well mind. Your identity is your self image, your self concept, your beliefs [Read more](https://freeportfamilychiropractic.com/articles/general/415740-identity) - [Spirituality](https://freeportfamilychiropractic.com/articles/general/415938-spirituality) Appreciating religious values and spiritual beliefs can help form a solid foundation of wellness in your life.
